data.simplified_title: A multi-faceted electronic health intervention to prevent and manage vascular disease in Australia
data.source_system: Heart disease and stroke are the leading cause of death and disability in Australia with Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander people experiencing it at a far greater rate; however most can be prevented.  Medical guidelines to prevent heart attacks and strokes are available to medical professionals, but theyï¿½re rarely used to their full potential.  My research uncovers a new health intervention that will broadly improve the ability of primary care staff to prevent and manage heart disease and stroke.

data.name: The George Institute for International Health
